attributes.action: Make "The Archer's" Theme Tune The National Anthem Of England and retain 'God save the Queen' as a the national andthem of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and NI.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Petition To Make "The Archer's" Theme Tune The National Anthem Of England 

Billy Connolly was right on this one. Here's some reasons why The Archer's theme tune should be made national anthem:

-Everone knows it.

-There are no words to learn

-It would get everyone on their feet easily

-It's about the most English thing about England

-The Queen can sing it too, without having to sing "God Save our Gracious Me".

-It can't be good to have the slowest National Anthem...well...ever.

You know it makes sense Tony!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
